Filter Base Class

Source: R/Filter.R

FilterBase.

Usage

Filter = Filter$new(id)
# public members
filter$id
filter$ff
filter$settings
filter$values
# public methods
filter$tune()
filter$tune_result()

Arguments

  • id (character(1)):
    The id of the Filter

  • packages (character()]:
    Set of required packages.

  • supported_features (list):
    The feature types supported by the filter.

  • supported_tasks (list):
    The task types supported by the filter.

  • settings (list):
    The settings for the Filter

Details

  • $calculate(task) calculates the filter values.

  • $new() creates a new object of class Filter.

  • $filter() filters a Task using specific criteria

    • returns a subsetted Task

  • $id stores an identifier for this Filter.

  • $filter_values stores the calculated filter values.

  • $packages stores the names of required packages.

  • $settings is a list of hyperparamter settings for this Filter.

See also

Other Filter: FilterAUC, FilterCMIM, FilterDISR, FilterGainRatio, FilterInformationGain, FilterJMIM, FilterJMI, FilterKruskalTest, FilterLinearCorrelation, FilterMIM, FilterNJMIM, FilterRankCorrelation, FilterSymmetricalUncertainty, FilterVariance
